name: SandSong
description:
SandSong is a desert harpooning game developed by Swinburne students for their final year project.

The team consists of:

  • Loughlin Connolly - Designer & Producer
  • David Dam - Rigging & VFX Artist
  • Jake Geradts - 3D Artist & Sound Designer
  • Liam Hall - Programmer
  • Jesse Lloyd-Dominik - Lead Programmer
  • Ben Robertson - Narrative Designer
  • Jess Ulcog - 3D Environment & Character Artist
  • Kai Wedge - Programmer
